name: cryptex
desc: A strange wooden device with letter wheels on it.  You think you read a book on it once - calling it a 'cryptex'.  Perhaps if you spell the correct word, it will open.
inRoom: A strange wooden device sits on a corner of the desk.
take: You pick up the strange device.
drop: You drop the cryptex on the floor.  It rolls a bit, then comes to a halt.
